vajjheti：[vajjha の denom．] 殺す，殺害す．ppr．vajjhayitvāna．cf．vaddheti．

Vajjheti，[denom．fr．vajjha] to destroy，kill J．VI，527 （siro vajjhayitvāna）．Kern，Toev．s．v．vaddh° proposes reading vaddhayitvāna （of a root vardh to cut），cutting off is perhaps better．The expression is hapax legomenon．（Page 593）

vajjheti：ဝဇ္ဈေတိ （နာ）
သတ်၏။ ဖျက်ဆီး၏။ဝဇ္ဈ
